title: Vernacular typography
content: [Here's a nice collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015154730/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/onpaperwings/sets/72157606009493480/) of vernacular typography. Just thought you might find it interesting.
author: Corey Holms

comments.content: I can't take credit for it - one of my friends at work shared the link with me. Since I feel guilty for my low level of involvement at this site, I thought this would be a good beginning...
